description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Why share when you can have it all? Greed Corp is an online multiplayer strategy game in which you battle for dominance over a world once rich in resources. In order to prevail, you must exhaust all remaining resources to build an army, and use the depleted collapsing terrain to your advantage. An extensive campaign mode and multiple unlockables prepare you to take the battle online. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
